name: Dental cleaning
description: A preventive procedure to remove plaque and tartar buildup from teeth and gums.

name: Fillings
description: A restorative procedure to fill cavities caused by tooth decay.

name: Root canal therapy
description: A treatment to remove infected or damaged tissue from inside a tooth.

name: Extraction
description: A surgical procedure to remove a tooth that cannot be saved.

name: Braces
description: An orthodontic treatment to correct misaligned teeth and bite issues.

name: Gum surgery
description: A surgical procedure to treat advanced gum disease and restore gum health.

name: Dental implant
description: A surgical procedure to replace a missing tooth with an artificial tooth root and crown.

name: Dental bonding
description: A cosmetic procedure to improve the appearance of chipped, discolored, or misshapen teeth.

name: Invisalign
description: An alternative orthodontic treatment to traditional braces that uses clear aligners to straighten teeth.

name: Periodontal maintenance
description: Continuing care for patients with gum disease to prevent its progression.

name: Wisdom teeth extraction
description: A surgical procedure to remove impacted wisdom teeth.

name: Dentures
description: A removable prosthesis to replace missing teeth.

name: Teeth whitening
description: A cosmetic procedure to lighten the color of teeth.

name: Oral surgery
description: A surgical procedure to treat a variety of oral health issues, including cancer, trauma, and deformity.

name: Dental crown
description: A restorative procedure to cover damaged or weakened teeth with a cap or crown.

name: Sedation
description: A medication to help patients feel relaxed and comfortable during dental procedures.

name: Dental bridge
description: A restorative procedure to replace missing teeth by attaching an artificial tooth to adjacent natural teeth.

name: Dental sealant
description: A preventive procedure to protect teeth from decay by applying a thin coating to the biting surfaces of molars and premolars.

name: Orthognathic surgery
description: A surgical procedure to correct misaligned jaws and improve bite function.

name: Fluoride treatment
description: A preventive procedure to strengthen teeth and prevent decay by applying a fluoride solution to the tooth surfaces.

name: Dental inlay/onlay
description: A restorative procedure to repair larger cavities by placing a custom-made restoration on the affected tooth.

name: Mouthguard
description: A protective appliance to prevent dental injury during sports or teeth grinding at night.

name: Cleft lip/palate repair
description: A surgical procedure to correct cleft lip and/or palate, a congenital condition in which the upper lip or roof of the mouth does not form properly.

name: Oral appliance therapy
description: A non-surgical treatment for sleep apnea that involves wearing a device that helps keep the airway open during sleep.

name: Gum contouring
description: A cosmetic procedure to reshape the gum line and create a more symmetrical, aesthetically pleasing smile.

name: Dental veneers
description: A cosmetic procedure to improve the appearance of teeth by placing thin, custom-made shells over the front surface of teeth.

name: Oral cancer screening
description: A procedure to detect early signs of oral cancer, usually through visual and tactile examination by a dentist.
